title: Facebook employees may face pay cut if they move to cheaper areas to work from home
text: Mark Zuckerberg says he expects about half of Facebook Inc.’s employees to work from home five to 10 years from now, but there’s a catch for those expecting to take their fat Silicon Valley salaries and live like kings in a rural area.

title: Facebook Adds New Features to Workplace App as Paid Users Surge to 5 Million
text: Facebook is going after the enterprise market with new video tools as the world shifts to remote workforces amid the pandemic.

title: Facebook expects half of employees to work remotely over next 5-10 years
text: Mark Zuckerberg said the company will permanently embrace remote work even after lockdowns lift

title: Facebook only company that can tell an advertiser if ads worked: Expert
text: Laura Martin, Needham and Co, and John Egbert, Stifel, join 'Power Lunch' to discuss Facebook's new products and how they play to the future of the company.

title: Facebook's workplace product now has more than five million paid users
text: CNBC's Julia Boorstin reports on headlines from Mark Zuckerberg's weekly internal Facebook meeting.

title: Facebook Will Permanently Shift 50% Of Its Employees To Remote Work
text: Facebook founder and CEO Mark Zuckerberg envisions 50% of the tech giant’s employees working from home in the next five to 10 years, in a shift dramatically accelerated by COVID-19. “We’re going to be the most forward-leaning company on remote work at our scale,” Zuckerberg told employees in his weekly staff Q&A session, which was

title: Mark Zuckerberg: Half of Facebook may work remotely by 2030
text: "There's a meaningful contrast between what we're doing and what some other companies are doing," Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg told NBC News in an interview. "This isn't a free-for-all.

title: Zuckerberg: 50% of Facebook employees could be working remotely in the next 5 to 10 years
text: Zuckerberg's announcement comes as several tech companies are allowing employees to work remotely indefinitely.

title: Facebook’s Workplace, now with 5M paying users, adds drop-in video Rooms and more
text: One of the biggest technology takeaways of the last couple of months has been that organizations need confident, wide-ranging digital strategies to stay afloat, and Facebook — in its wider bid to build products to serve businesses — is taking note. title: Facebook's work chat app reaches 5 million paid users, but still lags behind Microsoft and Slack
text: Facebook on Thursday announced that its Workplace enterprise software business has now reached 5 million paid users, up from 3 million in October.

title: Facebook Stock Breaks Out to All-Time High
text: Facebook stock has cleared 2018 resistance in a high-volume breakout and could rally to $300 in coming months.

title: Sheryl Sandberg Announces $20M Facebook Donation for Women, Minority And Veteran-Owned Businesses
text: Facebook Inc. (NASDAQ: FB) COO, Sheryl Sandberg, announced Facebook’s grant of $20 million to small businesses owned by women, minorities, and veterans in the United States.
